N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.6 - Reimbursement for railroad and property owners

State Regulations

Modifications to private rail crossings will be
considered a capital cost and the commissioner may provide for reimbursement of
such costs to impacted railroad and/or property owners due to modification, alteration or closure of a private rail crossing within an intercity rail
passenger service corridor. If the decision of the department is to not
participate in such costs, the department must provide written reasons therefor
to the railroad and property owners seeking reimbursement. Notes
